author: Asa Ben-Hur and David Horn and Hava T. Siegelmann and Vladimir Vapnik
title: A Support Vector Method for Hierarchical Clustering

To compare the performance of our algorithm with other hierarchical algorithms we ran it on the Iris data set [15], which is a standard benchmark in the pattern recognition literature.
